mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tranorder (ORDER_SEQ, USER_NUMBER, COIN_CODE, BS_CODE, TRAN_QUANTITY, TRAN_AMOUNT) VALUES (ORDER_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, #{userNumber}, #{coinCode}, #{buySellCode}, #{tranQuantity}, #{tranAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_SEQ, USER_NUMBER, COIN_CODE, BS_CODE, TRAN_QUANTITY, TRAN_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(TRAN_END_YN), TRAN_TIME FROM tranorder WHERE USER_NUMBER != #{userNumber} AND TRAN_AMOUNT = #{tranAmount} AND COIN_CODE = #{coinCode} AND BS_CODE != #{buySellCode} AND TRAN_END_YN = 'N' order by TRAN_TIME FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE tranorder SET TRAN_END_YN = 'Y', TRAN_TIME = sysdate, TRAN_QUANTITY = 0 WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} AND COIN_CODE = #{coinCode} AND BS_CODE = #{buySellCode} AND TRAN_QUANTITY = #{tranQuantity} AND TRAN_AMOUNT = #{tranAmount} AND ORDER_SEQ = #{orderSeq}

UPDATE tranorder SET TRAN_QUANTITY = TRAN_QUANTITY - #{tranQuantity}, TRAN_END_YN = case when TRAN_QUANTITY - #{tranQuantity} = 0 then 'Y' else TRAN_END_YN end, TRAN_TIME = sysdate WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} AND COIN_CODE = #{coinCode} AND BS_CODE = #{buySellCode} AND TRAN_AMOUNT = #{tranAmount} AND TRAN_END_YN = 'N' AND ORDER_SEQ = #{orderSeq}
